name: Social Media Downloader (yt-dlp)
author: AWENK AUDICO & Gemini
description: Downloads videos from various social media platforms (YouTube, TikTok, etc.) using a list of URLs.

properties.label: loc.prop_url_list_variable_label
properties.description: The payload variable containing the list of objects with URLs.

properties.label: loc.prop_url_key_in_object_label
properties.description: The key name inside each JSON object that holds the video URL.

properties.label: loc.prop_output_folder_label
properties.description: The folder where the downloaded videos will be saved.

output_schema.name: data.downloaded_files
output_schema.description: A list of local file paths for the successfully downloaded videos.
